DOC.brief_title: Protein Blends ( Soy , Whey Casein ) Muscle Synthesis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . Age 1835 yr 2 . Stable body weight least 1 year Exclusion criterion : 1 . Exercise training ( > 2 weekly session moderate high intensity aerobic resistance exercise ) 2 . Significant heart , liver , kidney , blood , respiratory disease 3 . Peripheral vascular disease 4 . Diabetes mellitus untreated endocrine disease 5 . Active cancer ( group ) history cancer ( group potentially randomizable rapamycin ) 6 . Acute infectious disease history chronic infection ( e.g . TB , hepatitis , HIV , herpes ) 7 . Recent ( within 6 month ) treatment anabolic steroid , corticosteroid . 8 . Alcohol drug abuse 9 . Tobacco use ( smoke chew ) 10 . Malnutrition ( BMI < 20 kg/m2 , hypoalbuminemia , and/or hypotransferrinemia ) 11 . Obesity ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 ) 12 . Low hemoglobin level ( normal value ) 13 . Food allergies 14 . Taking dietary supplement green tea , etc . 15 . Currently highsoy diet ( consume > 2 serving soy per day )
